DOC.brief_summary: A study determine whether new formulation methylprednisolone suspension bioequivalent methylprednisolone tablet feed condition .
DOC.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study Comparing Methylprednisolone Suspension Methylprednisolone Tablets Under Fed Conditions
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject age 21 55 year . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 total body weight > 45 kg ( 99 lb ) . Any condition possible affect drug absorption ( eg , gastectomy ) . A positive urine drug screen .
